token_info.name: Tones ♩ ♪ ♫ ♬
token_info.description: ♩ ♪ ♫ ♬ Move your cursor or drag on mobile ♩ ♪ ♫ ♬  Tones was exhibited as an interactive musical touchscreen display in the group show “Make Believe” at Birmingham Open Media (7th June – 31st August 2019) alongside artists Gene Kogan, Sofia Crespo, & Will Pappenheimer. https://www.bom.org.uk/whats-on/gallery/make-believe/
